mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1122) for an order placed by Harts Bakery for 4 orders of 50 two color window cards for a performance by Slim Rhodes with The Kids at the High School in Cobden, Illinois on March 11, Beech Bluff High School in Beach Bluff, Tennessee on March 25, Goreville Township High School in Coreville, Illinois on March 26, and High School in Cash, Arkansas on April 2. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
